XmRControlChart¶

class XmRControlChart.XmRControlChart(data: list)¶

Bases: ControlChart

Initialization.

Parameters:

data – values.

data(index: int)¶

Returns the data.

Parameters:

index – The index for the data (0 = X chart, 1 = mR chart)

normally_distributed(data: list, significance_level: float)¶

Check if the data follows normal distribution. Returns true when the data did not show evidence of non-normality. Returns false when the data is not normally distributed.

Parameters:

  • data – values.

  • significance_level – significance level.

plot()¶

Create the plot.

split(stages: list)¶

Split the chart.

Parameters:

stages – The stages.

stable()¶

Returns the stable indicator.
